channel.title: selenium-webdriver on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in selenium-webdriver on Some Title

item.title: I made a script to greet you at my Koshien
item.description: I tried to automate a certain task in a browser game called "My Koshien" using Python. I don’t use Python at all, so it’s a beginner level code. Please note. What is my Koshien High school baseball simulation game. Although it is a baseball game, the actual game is played by the CPU, and the main player is coaching and coaching. Points are required for this instruction, and among some points there is a Passion PT, which can be increased by greeting another school (other player).

item.title: Automatic login to ServiceNow with Selenium Web Driver
item.description: # ◆Overview Using Selenium WebDriver, which is used for automation of Web UI tests, I tried to log in ServiceNow automatically. ◆Operating environment OS: Windows10 Python version: 3.8.0 Preparation Creating an instance of ServiceNow You can create a developer instance by registering an account from the ServiceNow Developers page. Make sure to write down the instance URL and the initial information of the admin account when the creation is completed.

item.title: What happens to the access log when accessing the website automatically with selenium-webdriver
item.description: #Purpose Actually, I was secretly automating part of the internal work, but I suddenly looked into the server log and thought that it would be obvious that it was automated, so I verified it. Verification environment Use PaizaCloud as a web server Use Selenium-webdriver and headless-chrome as an automatic access method Use Python as a program to automate What you did Introducing Selenium and Headless Chrome There are many articles about this, so I will omit it.
